ComicInfo.Title: We are Family
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Illegitimates are assembled and identities revealed as Dannikor's world-changing plot kicks into gear! Can these kids process their newly revealed parentage and, more importantly, get along long enough to embrace their legacies and save the planet from a zombified doom? And, hey, what about the Illegitimates' moms...?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Kevin Sharpe (p), Diana Greenhalgh (i) & Peter Pantazis (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Jerry Ordway | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:20:54. [CVDB442196]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Diana Greenhalgh, Jerry Ordway, Kevin Sharpe, Peter Pantazis
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Lordsley, Kiken, Leandros, Saalinge, Viktor Dannikor, Vin Darlington
ComicInfo.Locations: Madrid, South Africa, Switzerland, Texas, Tokyo, Ukraine
